QuestData.Title: Singed Feathers
QuestData.Description:
Ca-caw! Caw caw!
<The chieftain flaps his wings and points outside where the storm dragons attack the ravenbears of his tribe.
It's plain to see that he's seeking your help to save his flock.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Rampaging Squallhunters in the Stormtorn Foothills.
QuestData.RewardText: The Blackfeather chieftain bows respectfully to you. $B$BYou have helped ensure the survival of his tribe.
